plot: Step into the most popular TV series of the 80's and get behind the wheel of the most high-tech supercar! Knight Industry Two Thousand, better known as KITT, has returned. And this time you are in control!
title: Knight Rider: The Game
plot_es: Step into the most popular TV series of the 80's and get behind the wheel of the most high-tech supercar! Knight Industry Two Thousand, better known as KITT, has returned. And this time you are in control!
plot_en: Step into the most popular TV series of the 80's and get behind the wheel of the most high-tech supercar! Knight Industry Two Thousand, better known as KITT, has returned. And this time you are in control!
